title: Intern Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. I interviewed at Synergos
Interview Descriptions: Two round phone calls, one is from manager and the other is from the director.  It is not very difficult. Then I receive the offer and decided to accept it.
Interview Questions: Why do you want to join the company?

title: Human Resources Interview
Interview Descriptions:
I applied through my college's portal and got an email for an interview over two weeks later. 
I was interviewed by the one who set up the interview, and she told me a bit about the company. Then she asked me why I was interested, what I'm doing, and some general details about me. I felt like the interview ended abruptly, cause I wasn't asked questions such as what I knew about the company, etc. 
Later, I got an email saying I got the position and to come in for orientation.
Interview Questions: Why are you interested in Human Resources?

title: Partnerships Program Interview
Interview Descriptions: The interview process was fairly easy.  We chatted as if we have known each other for a while. The conversation flowed naturally. She just wanted to get to know me and was extremely interested in what I was doing at the moment and seemed very invested in me.
Interview Questions: What do you know about our organization?

title: Intern Interview
Application Type: I applied through college or university. I interviewed at Synergos
Interview Descriptions: I applied through college's database and received a call from the division about two weeks later. The interviewer was very chill and kind. After going through my resume, she asked me to tell her what I know about the company. No behavioral questions or anything technical.
Interview Questions:
Tell me about this job that you have.
What do you know about Synergos?
Why do you apply here?

title: Intern Interview
Interview Descriptions: Only one interview on the phone. Normal questions - asking about my experience and what my undergrad work was focused on. Found out I was selected about a month later
